metadata.title: CVE-2018-21016 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: audio_sample_entry_AddBox() at isomedia/box_code_base.c in GPAC 0.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ccextractor package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
